title: Family and Relationships 1
sentences: My mother is a Spanish teacher.
viven en un pueblo muy pequeño.
My grandparents live in a very small village.
Do you have siblings or are you an only child?
His/her son studies medicine at the university.
toca el piano desde los cinco años.
My daughter has played the piano since she was five.
siempre nos trae regalos por Navidad.
My aunt always brings us gifts for Christmas.
What is your nephew's name, your brother's son?
My niece is very intelligent and fun.
trabaja en una oficina en el centro.
My husband works in an office downtown.
His wife is a very famous engineer.
vive en otra ciudad, pero nos vemos mucho.
My girlfriend lives in another city, but we see each other a lot.
Do you get along well with your brother-in-law?
My mother-in-law cooks an incredible paella.
Do you know my son-in-law, my daughter's husband?
es de Italia y habla cuatro idiomas.
His/her daughter-in-law is from Italy and speaks four languages.
We are a very big and close-knit family.
de Pedro es todavía un bebé.
Pedro's grandson is still a baby.
tiene los ojos azules como yo.
My granddaughter has blue eyes like me.
Do you have many relatives in this city?
My parents divorced two years ago.
el próximo sábado en la playa.
She is getting married next Saturday on the beach.
I get along well with all my family.
dictionary:
La madre - The mother
El padre - The father
Los abuelos - The grandparents
El hermano / La hermana - The brother/sister
El hijo / La hija - The son/daughter
El primo / La prima - The cousin
El tío / La tía - The uncle/aunt
El sobrino / La sobrina - The nephew/niece
El marido - The husband
La mujer - The wife
El novio / La novia - The boyfriend/girlfriend
El cuñado / La cuñada - The brother-in-law/sister-in-law
El suegro / La suegra - The father-in-law/mother-in-law
El yerno - The son-in-law
La nuera - The daughter-in-law
La familia - The family
El nieto / La nieta - The grandson/granddaughter
Los parientes - The relatives
Divorciarse - To get divorced
Casarse - To get married
Bien - Well
